tools.name: convert_to_markdown
tools.description:
Convert content from various sources to structured Markdown format.

    Args:
        source: The source of the content (HTTP/HTTPS URL, file path, or data URI).

    Returns:
        The converted content in Markdown format.

    Raises:
        ValueError: If the source type is not supported or conversion fails.

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具能否正确将本地PDF文件转换为Markdown格式

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Failed to read file D:\devWorkspace\MCPServer-Generator\testSystem\testFiles\sample1.pdf: 'utf-8' codec can't decode byte 0xe2 in position 10: invalid continuation byte

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具能否正确将CSV文件内容结构化为Markdown表格

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Failed to convert content to Markdown: [Errno 22] Invalid argument: 'A,B,C\n1,2,3\n4,5,6'

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Convert empty content file to Markdown
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 测试工具对空内容文件的处理能力

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Failed to convert content to Markdown: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: ''

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Convert online HTML page to Markdown
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具是否支持从远程URL获取HTML并成功转换为Markdown

response.error:
ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Client error '404 Not Found' for url 'https://example.com/sample.html'
For more information check: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Status/404

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 测试工具对不支持的文件类型的错误处理能力

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Failed to read file D:\devWorkspace\MCPServer-Generator\testSystem\testFiles\nature.jpeg: 'utf-8' codec can't decode byte 0xff in position 0: invalid start byte

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 测试工具在源路径无效时的错误处理

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Unsupported source type: D:\invalid_path\nonexistent_file.docx

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 测试工具对包含特殊字符的URL的兼容性

response.error:
ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Client error '404 Not Found' for url 'https://example.com/path%20with/space+plus.html'
For more information check: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Status/404

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Security check for malicious URL input
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 测试工具是否能安全处理潜在恶意输入，如尝试访问系统敏感资源

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Failed to read file file:///etc/passwd: [Errno 22] Invalid argument: 'file:///etc/passwd'
